TopicTitle: Re entry heat and structural integrity

Articles.Content: I wonder does will have more realistic re-entry model, i mean for example limit durability of heat shield.

I wonder does will as well

There is a mod for this now however

When eventually implemented, reentry heating is going to burn up anything not protected with a heat shield. So will excessive G forces cause problems as well.

Just play the sim with the goal that ships will burn up unless designed for reentry or aerobraking and that G forces exceeding a certain level could be fatal.
excessive g forces already cause problems, atleast on poor designs, you can break a ship in half doing an aerobrake, if you're going fast enough and have a large mass and weak connections
